body_html: Your network looks relatively small, and I would assume that the overhead of moving data into two separate GPUs and then merging them back again is more than the gain you'd get from using two GPUs in parallel.
body_text: Your network looks relatively small, and I would assume that the overhead of moving data into two separate GPUs and then merging them back again is more than the gain you'd get from using two GPUs in parallel.
body: Your network looks relatively small, and I would assume that the overhead of moving data into two separate GPUs and then merging them back again is more than the gain you'd get from using two GPUs in parallel.
